alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mecklenburg and Lunenburg Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Drakes Branch to near Alton. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. In addition, rainfall amount of 1 to 2 inches per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chase City, Victoria, Kenbridge, Lunenburg, Clarksville, Boydton, Kells Corner, Buffalo Springs, Rehoboth, Nelson, Wilburn, Spanish Grove, Arvins Store, Finchley, Nutbush, Finneywood, Fairview, Plantersville, Rogers Corner and Blevins Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
